subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Michal Neuvirth made 31 saves for his second shutout of the season and Alex Ovechkin scored his 19th goal on a power play in the second period to lift Washington to a 3-0 victory in Montreal.
snippet: Michal Neuvirth made 31 saves for his second shutout of the season and Alex Ovechkin scored his 19th goal on a power play in the second period to lift Washington to a 3-0 victory in Montreal.
